caller_intent: The caller (Amania from Alliance Insurance) sought assistance to change the payment schedule of an Exodus Holding policy from an 11-pay plan back to a 12-pay plan.
resolution_steps: Kirsten confirmed the policyholder's request to revert to a 12-pay schedule.
Calculated the required payment of $1,898.98 to bring the policy up to date based on prior billing cycles.
Warned about a pending $1,902.04 automatic payment if the adjustment wasn't processed before August 10th.
Recommended initiating the payment via routing and checking information to avoid overdrafts.
Confirmed the payment amount and timeline with the caller.
knowledge_required: Understanding of insurance payment plans (11-pay vs. 12-pay)
summary: An Alliance Insurance agent coordinated with Penn National Insurance to adjust a policy's payment schedule from 11-pay to 12-pay. The agent calculated a required payment of $1,898.98 to avoid a pending $1,902.04 automatic draft, ensuring the policyholder could transition smoothly back to the 12-pay plan by August 10th.
